corrector-modal.text: The following actions will be applied to correct some of the infrastructure's errors:
corrector-modal.title: Automatic error corrector

duplicated_group.description: Switch type « {{obj_id}} » contains a duplicate configuration « {{original_group_path}} »
duplicated_group.name: Duplicated switch pattern

invalid_group.description: The switch « {{obj_id}} » of the route « {{group}} » is in the configuration « {{switch_type}} » which does not exist
invalid_group.name: Invalid switch position

invalid_reference.description: The object « {{obj_id}} » references the object « {{reference.obj_id}} » which does not exist
invalid_reference.name: Invalid reference

invalid_route.description: Route « {{obj_id}} » is invalid, requested path is not consistent
invalid_route.name: Invalid route

invalid_switch_ports.description: Switch « {{obj_id}} » has a branch which is not compatible with its type
invalid_switch_ports.name: Invalid switch pattern

missing_buffer_stop.description: Endpoint « {{endpoint}} » of track « {{obj_id}} » has no buffer stop
missing_buffer_stop.name: Missing buffer stop

node_endpoints_not_unique.description: The « {{obj_id}} » node has a track endpoint used by several ports.
node_endpoints_not_unique.name: Node endpoints not unique

object_out_of_path.description: Object « {{obj_id}} » of track « {{reference.obj_id}} » is not contained in the corresponding path
object_out_of_path.name: Object out of path

odd_buffer_stop_location.description: Buffer stop « {{obj_id}} » has a strange position
odd_buffer_stop_location.name: Strange buffer stop position

out_of_range.description: Object « {{obj_id}} » has the field « {{field}} » with an invalid value. Value must be in the following range [{{expected_range}}].
out_of_range.name: Invalid value

overlapping_electrifications.description: Electrification « {{obj_id}} » overlaps electrification « {{reference.obj_id}} » on the same track and with the same voltage
overlapping_electrifications.name: Overlapping of electrification zones

overlapping_switches.description: Switches « {{obj_id}} » and « {{reference.obj_id}} » have the same extremeties
overlapping_switches.name: Overlapping of switches

unknown_port_name.description: Switch « {{obj_id}} » has the branch « {{port_name}} » which does not exist
unknown_port_name.name: Unknown branch name

unused_port.description: Branch « {{port_name}} » of switch type « {{obj_id}} » is nerver used
unused_port.name: Unused branch

infra-errors.infra-locked: Please note that you will not be able to save any changes.
infra-errors.infra-readonly: Please note that you are in read-only mode on this infra

list.goto-error: Select and locate on the map

linear-metadata.help: This component allows you to view and modify a linear layout. You can zoom into the view using the provided buttons or the mouse wheel, and move around using drag'n'drop. To change the size of a segment, simply click on it and the edit form will be displayed below. You can also click on a border of a segment, and while keeping your finger pressed, move the border with the mouse.

nav.toggle-layers: Choose the types of elements to display

actions.confirm-delete-entity: Are you sure you want to remove the buffer stop?
Are you sure you want to remove the detector?

actions.confirm-delete-electrification: Are you sure you want to remove the electrification?

help.add-track: Link the track section '{{track.id}}' to the electrification {{voltage}}
help.init: Click on a track section to link it to the electrification
help.remove-range: Remove the track section from  the electrification {{voltage}}

point-edition.default-routes-error: An error occurred while loading linked routes.

help.start-dragging: Click on the item to start moving it.
help.stop-dragging-no-line: The element must be placed on a track section.
help.stop-dragging-on-line: Click to confirm the move of the element.

range-edition.empty-linked-track-section: Click on a track section to link it to the electrification
range-edition.only-show-n: Only show the first {{count}} track sections

actions.pick-entry_point-cancel: Cancel the selection of the starting point

routes-edition.confirm-delete-route: Are you sure to delete this route?
routes-edition.delete-route-success: The route has been successfully deleted.
routes-edition.geometry-error: An exception occurred during calculation of this route

help.actions-on-edit-route: You can delete the route, edit it or create a new one.
help.select-endpoints: The route must have a starting and ending point.
help.select-waypoint: Select a detector or a buffer stop.
help.validate-route: You can validate this route, or select another one.

routes-edition.label: Route tool
routes-edition.locked-release-detectors: This property can not be disabled after saving
routes-edition.no-waypoint-picked-yet: Click the button to select a detector or a bufferstop on the map

actions.confirm-delete-selection: Are you sure you want to remove the selection?

errors.no-heterogenous-edition: It's not possible to edit multiple elements of different types at the same time.
errors.no-multi-edition: It's not possible yet to edit multiple elements (TODO).

help.polygon-selection: Click to outline a polygon. Double-click to close it, and select all elements inside.
help.rectangle-selection: Double-click to outline a rectangle. All elements in this rectangle will then be selected.
help.single-selection: Click an item to select or deselect it. You can select multiple items by pressing the Control key.

actions.confirm-delete-entity: Are you sure you want to remove the signal?

actions.confirm-delete-speed-section: Are you sure you want to remove the speed limit?

speed-edition.incompatible-switch: This switch position is not compatible with the other switches positions
speed-edition.label: Speed section tool
speed-edition.select-switches-to-get-route: Select switches and their position to search for routes
speed-edition.toggle-psl-help: Click on a track section first to be able to activate this option

actions.confirm-delete-switch: Are you sure you want to remove the switch?
actions.pick-track: Track selection tool on the map

switch-edition.duplicate-errors: The track {{track}} is already used by the port {{port}}

help.no-move: Switches cannot be moved, and are automatically placed on their first port.
help.select-track: Select a track on the map

switch-edition.label: Switch tool

actions.add-at-end: Add the new points at the end
actions.add-at-start: Add the new points at the beginning
actions.confirm-delete-line: Are you sure you want to remove the line?

track-edition.default-electrifications-error: An error occurred when loading the electrifications linked to this track section.
track-edition.default-speed-sections-error: An exception occurred when loading speed limits related to this track section.

help.add-anchor-point: Click to add a point at the end of the track section. Click on the track to add an intermediate point.
help.add-point: Click to add a point at the end of the track section.
help.delete-point: Click on a point to remove it from the track section.
help.move-point: Click a point once to start moving it.
help.move-point-end: Click to confirm the move of the point.

track-edition.label: Track tool

help.default: Click on the split point on the map, or enter its offset from the beginning of the track section in the form
help.hover: Click on the point to be able to move it
help.move: Click to validate the move, or press 'esc' to cancel
help.split: Click on the track section to split it at this location

offset.description: Offset of the point in meters to the beginning of the track section
offset.error: The offset of the split point to the beginning must be greater than 1 and smaller than {{max}}
offset.label: Position

authorization.permissionDenied: You don't have permission to perform this action

common.leaveEditionMode: You are about to exit edit mode, any unsaved changes will be lost.

infraManagement.addInfraJSON: Create an infrastructure from a RailJSON file
infraManagement.deleteConfirm: Do you wish to delete the infrastructure?

jsonUpload.badJSON: Invalid content. Only RailJSON files are supported (usually .json or .railjson extensions)
jsonUpload.uploadError: Error occurred while upload the file

mapSearch.name: Name
mapSearch.too-many-results: There are more than 100 results, please refine your search.

nav-bar.safeWordHelp: The "security keyword" allows you to transparently filter the list of projects with the word you enter, used as a label. Choose a complicated word so that no-one uses it inadvertently. Add it as a label to a project; it will be automatically added when the project is created if the word is entered here.

rollingStock.cancelUpdateRollingStock: Do you really want to cancel your changes?
rollingStock.chooseRollingStock: Select a rolling stock to display informations
rollingStock.confirmAddRollingStock: Are you sure you want to add this rolling stock ?

delete.comfort: Are you sure you want to delete this comfort level ? All the curves associated to it will be lost.
delete.electrical_profile_level: Are you sure you want to delete this electrical profile ? All the curves associated to it will be lost.
delete.power_restriction_code: Are you sure you want to delete the curve associated to this power restriction ?
delete.tractionMode: Are you sure you want to delete this traction mode ? All the curves associated to it will be lost.

rollingStock.deleteRollingStock: Would you like to delete this rolling stock?

errorMessages.minMaxRangeError: The value must be between {{min}} and {{max}}
errorMessages.minRangeError: The value must be greater than {{min}}
errorMessages.missingConversion: This conversion doesn't exist in the schema. Value hasn't been changed.
errorMessages.rollingStockUsed: This rolling stock is used in the following scenarios:

rollingStock.listDisabled: Please quit edit mode to access the list

messages.invalidEffortCurves: Invalid curves: {{invalidEffortCurves}}. Each curve must have at least 2 combinations of speed / effort values (with no duplication of speed values). Combinations with at least one empty field are ignored. A speed can't exceed 600km/h and an effort can't exceed 1000kN.
messages.missingInformationAutomaticallyFilled_on: The following field was initialized by default: {{invalidFields}}.
messages.missingInformationAutomaticallyFilled_ot: The following fields were initialized by default: {{invalidFields}}.
messages.missingPrimaryCategory: Please fill out a primary category
messages.rollingStockDuplicateName: Rolling stock of the same name already exists.

rollingStock.waitingLoader: Please wait, rolling stock database loading…
